/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and buses are seen in motion, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
